R library dependencies for running Stat.R and ML.R scripts.
For installation of dependent libraries through CRAN: use 00_Install_Libraries.R script
For offline installation: use 00_Install_Libraries_Offline.R script
Install all the packages in the same ascending numerical order listed inside ~\library to avoid dependency issues.
For the most recent version of the libraries, use the Comprehensive R Archive Network (CRAN): https://cran.r-project.org/
For updating already installed packages use: update.packages()
